alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 01 at 9:35AM EST until December 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and areas of blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. Greatest amounts in Oswego County and across the Tug Hill Plateau. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4360 7513 4380 7512 4374 7543 4382 7578 4367 7602 4346 7623 4336 7611 4348 7581 4345 7570 4342 7550 TIME Y22M12D01T0900Z-Y22M12D01T1200Z COORD...4360 7513 4376 7513 4387 7583 4372 7622 4357 7625 4343 7667 4325 7655 4320 7587 4348 7581 4342 7550 TIME Y22M12D01T1200Z-Y22M12D01T1800Z COORD...4356 7559 4366 7605 4365 7617 4355 7606 4343 7601 4338 7593 4341 7583 4348 7581 4342 7550 4350 7542 TIME Y22M12D01T1800Z-Y22M12D02T0000Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
